016package io.micronaut.maven.jib;
017
018import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.api.buildplan.*;
019import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.buildplan.UnixPathParser;
020import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.maven.extension.JibMavenPluginExtension;
021import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.maven.extension.MavenData;
022import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.plugins.extension.ExtensionLogger;
023import io.micronaut.core.util.StringUtils;
024import io.micronaut.maven.core.MicronautRuntime;
025import io.micronaut.maven.services.ApplicationConfigurationService;
026
027import java.util.*;
028
029/**
030 * Jib extension to support building Docker images.
031 *
032 * @author Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal
033 * @since 1.1
034 */
035public class JibMicronautExtension implements JibMavenPluginExtension<Void> {
036
037    public static final String DEFAULT_BASE_IMAGE = "eclipse-temurin:17-alpine";
038    private static final String LATEST_TAG = "latest";
039
040    @Override
041    public Optional<Class<Void>> getExtraConfigType() {
042        return Optional.empty();
043    }
044
045    @Override
046    public ContainerBuildPlan extendContainerBuildPlan(ContainerBuildPlan buildPlan, Map<String, String> properties,
047                                                       Optional<Void> extraConfig, MavenData mavenData,
048                                                       ExtensionLogger logger) {
049
050        ContainerBuildPlan.Builder builder = buildPlan.toBuilder();
051        MicronautRuntime runtime = MicronautRuntime.valueOf(mavenData.getMavenProject().getProperties().getProperty(MicronautRuntime.PROPERTY, "none").toUpperCase());
052
053        JibConfigurationService jibConfigurationService = new JibConfigurationService(mavenData.getMavenProject());
054
055        if (StringUtils.isEmpty(buildPlan.getBaseImage())) {
056            builder.setBaseImage(DEFAULT_BASE_IMAGE);
057        }
058
059        ApplicationConfigurationService applicationConfigurationService = new ApplicationConfigurationService(mavenData.getMavenProject());
060        try {
061            int port = Integer.parseInt(applicationConfigurationService.getServerPort());
062            if (port > 0) {
063                logger.log(ExtensionLogger.LogLevel.LIFECYCLE, "Exposing port: " + port);
064                builder.addExposedPort(Port.tcp(port));
065            }
066        } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
067            // ignore, can't automatically expose port
068            logger.log(ExtensionLogger.LogLevel.LIFECYCLE, "Dynamically resolved port present. Ensure the port is correctly exposed in the <container> configuration. See https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/jib/tree/master/jib-maven-plugin#example for an example.");
069        }
070
071        switch (runtime.getBuildStrategy()) {
072            case ORACLE_FUNCTION -> {
073                List<? extends LayerObject> originalLayers = buildPlan.getLayers();
074                builder.setLayers(originalLayers.stream().map(JibMicronautExtension::remapLayer).toList());
075                List<String> cmd = jibConfigurationService.getArgs();
076                if (cmd.isEmpty()) {
077                    cmd = Collections.singletonList("io.micronaut.oraclecloud.function.http.HttpFunction::handleRequest");
078                }
079                String projectFnVersion = determineProjectFnVersion(System.getProperty("java.version"));
080                builder.setBaseImage("fnproject/fn-java-fdk:" + projectFnVersion)
081                        .setWorkingDirectory(AbsoluteUnixPath.get(jibConfigurationService.getWorkingDirectory().orElse("/function")))
082                        .setEntrypoint(buildProjectFnEntrypoint())
083                        .setCmd(cmd);
084            }
085            case LAMBDA -> {
086                List<String> entrypoint = buildPlan.getEntrypoint();
087                Objects.requireNonNull(entrypoint).set(entrypoint.size() - 1, "io.micronaut.function.aws.runtime.MicronautLambdaRuntime");
088                builder.setEntrypoint(entrypoint);
089            }
090            default -> {
091                //no op
092            }
093        }
094        return builder.build();
095    }
096
097    public static List<String> buildProjectFnEntrypoint() {
098        List<String> entrypoint = new ArrayList<>(9);
099        entrypoint.add("/usr/java/latest/bin/java");
100        entrypoint.add("-XX:-UsePerfData");
101        entrypoint.add("-XX:+UseSerialGC");
102        entrypoint.add("-Xshare:on");
103        entrypoint.add("-Djava.awt.headless=true");
104        entrypoint.add("-Djava.library.path=/function/runtime/lib");
105        entrypoint.add("-cp");
106        entrypoint.add("/function/app/classes:/function/app/libs/*:/function/app/resources:/function/runtime/*");
107        entrypoint.add("com.fnproject.fn.runtime.EntryPoint");
108        return entrypoint;
109    }
110
111    public static String determineProjectFnVersion(String javaVersion) {
112        int majorVersion = Integer.parseInt(javaVersion.split("\\.")[0]);
113        if (majorVersion >= 17) {
114            return "jre17-latest";
115        } else {
116            return LATEST_TAG;
117        }
118    }
119
120    static LayerObject remapLayer(LayerObject layerObject) {
121        FileEntriesLayer originalLayer = (FileEntriesLayer) layerObject;
122        FileEntriesLayer.Builder builder = FileEntriesLayer.builder().setName(originalLayer.getName());
123        for (FileEntry originalEntry : originalLayer.getEntries()) {
124            builder.addEntry(remapEntry(originalEntry, layerObject.getName()));
125        }
126
127        return builder.build();
128    }
129
130    static FileEntry remapEntry(FileEntry originalEntry, String layerName) {
131        List<String> pathComponents = UnixPathParser.parse(originalEntry.getExtractionPath().toString());
132        AbsoluteUnixPath newPath;
133        if (layerName.contains("dependencies")) {
134            newPath = AbsoluteUnixPath.get("/function/app/libs/" + pathComponents.get(pathComponents.size() - 1));
135        } else {
136            //classes or resources
137            newPath = AbsoluteUnixPath.get("/function" + originalEntry.getExtractionPath());
138        }
139
140        return new FileEntry(originalEntry.getSourceFile(), newPath, originalEntry.getPermissions(),
141                originalEntry.getModificationTime(), originalEntry.getOwnership());
142    }
143
144}
